primevc.gui.behaviours.RenderGraphicsBehaviour

type
class
extends
ValidatingBehaviour<primevc.gui.traits.IDrawable>
implements
primevc.gui.traits.IGraphicsValidator
Behaviour that will respond changes in the graphicData and layout of the given target. When one of these who object's changes, it will request a new rendering.
